Name: Stela of Piay
Description: The stela is divided into three registers. In the top register, in the middle, a shen-ring with two ripples of water has been placed into the texts to the scene, which depicts Osiris and Isis in front of an offering table with a man offering. The second register depicts two couples, one on each side. A man on the left is bearing offerings. The third register shows a man on the left receiving offerings from two men and two women.
